Data Fields
sg_font_char_t Struct Reference

Font Character Data. More...

#include <sg_font_types.h>

Detailed Description

Holds the data for a font character.

Data Fields

u16 offset
 
u8 width
 
u8 height
 
s16 xoffset
 
s16 yoffset
 

Field Documentation

u8 sg_font_char_t::height

Height of the character

u16 sg_font_char_t::offset

Characters data location within the font file or memory

u8 sg_font_char_t::width

Width of the character

s16 sg_font_char_t::xoffset

Character's x offset

s16 sg_font_char_t::yoffset
